column4: I have installed all the codecs and done things I found suggested in the forums, and still ... when I try to play a .mov file with Totem Movie Player, the application immediately shuts down
yeah, Titem can do that, Use mplayer or vlc
do you have a suggestion as to which one would be the best for .mov files ... or the all around best choice?
I always swear by mplayer but vlc is actually slightlt better with video files so if you must choose go with vlc
